recipe.ingredients: 2 cups cooked chicken breast, diced, 1 ripe avocado, diced, 1 medium cucumber, diced, 1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved, 1/4 cup diced red onion, 2 tablespoons chopped cilantro, Juice of 1 lime, 2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, 1/2 teaspoon cumin, Salt and pepper to taste, 1/4 teaspoon chili flakes (optional)
recipe.directions: In a large bowl, combine the diced chicken, avocado, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, and red onion. Sprinkle with chopped cilantro, In a small bowl, whisk together lime juice, olive oil, cumin, salt, pepper, and chili flakes if using. Pour the dressing over the salad and gently toss to coat all the ingredients evenly. Adjust seasoning to taste, Serve immediately or chill in the refrigerator for 30 minutes before serving for flavors to meld.
